channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Illegal advertising posters on blendon road/ banwell road, 7th July
item.description:
Junction of blendon road/banwell roaad- its paving being advertised and the poster are very large hard to miss.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Banwell Road, Blendon, London

item.title: Constantly dirty streets and pavements, 7th July
item.description:
Please provide every day streets and pavements cleaning by swiping the streets and pavements to collect all kinds of rubbish laying all over the place.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Watts Street, Peckham, London

item.title: Fly tipping, 7th July
item.description:
I saw the restaurant that rents two of the garages in staff street ( i have added a photo of their garages ) fly tip these items onto Vince street on Friday afternoon.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Vince Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Overhanging vegetation and bushed covering half the pavement, 7th July
item.description:
There is lots of ivy and vegetation overhanging the pavement which is not very wide and also there is now a large road sign obstructing the pavement making it even more difficult once past all this there is a bush over half the pavement where you walk down the slope to the station which also has a tree overhanging the pathway
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bexley Road, Northumberland Heath, London

item.title: Builders Waste, 7th July
item.description:
Someone has dumped a load of builders waste directly in front of our bin store. If this isn’t removed, our bins won’t be collected and they are already overflowing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13-18, Lemonwell Drive, Avery Hill, London

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Northumberland Heath, London

item.title: Overhanging vegetation with hedges and ivy, 7th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Northumberland Heath, London

item.title: Landrover defender engine running, nobody in the car, 7th July
item.description:
Walking past shops near 85 Mountgrove Road on Monday 7 July. The engine of the Landrover Defender was running, despite the fact that the steering wheel lock was on and nobody was in the vehicle. I have a video to prove that the engine was running

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mountgrove Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Milborne Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Rubbish still here, 7th July
item.description:
Hi The rubbish was not collected on 27th June. I did report it and was told: Issues such as missed collections, ordering of recycling containers or applying for garden waste collection should be submitted online via: https://recyclingservices.bromley.gov.uk/waste That website will not let me report it... So now reporting again! Please ensure this is collected.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 152, Lennard Road, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is a broken manhole cover outside of 7 & 8 Battle Road which is loose and each time a car/vehicle goes over this it shakes, this need replacing ASAP, 7th July
item.description:
There is a broken manhole cover outside of 7 & 8 Battle Road which is loose and each time a car/vehicle goes over this it shakes, this need replacing ASAP as it is a danger to cars and children in buggies etc, and elderly people on scooters as the pavement is very narrow causing them to go into the road. Resident is requesting for this to be actioned ASAP.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Battle Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
